channel.title: "Wireless is not associated"
channel.description: I have followed all instructions and have added my Netgear M6 Hotspot as WLAN0 with connectivity and it is showing up in Speedify Overview page. I have also added my home wifi network, but it is not showing in Speedify and has a message under the Wireless Overview section that says "Wireless is not associated". I can't figure out what that means or how to correct it so that I can use another internet connection in Speedify.

item.title: "Wireless is not associated"
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Hi, does clicking scan next to the assigned (5 or 2.4ghz radio) display the home AP in scan results?

Read full topic

item.title: "Wireless is not associated"
item.dc:creator: rwathen
item.description:
I have followed all instructions and have added my Netgear M6 Hotspot as WLAN0 with connectivity and it is showing up in Speedify Overview page. I have also added my home wifi network, but it is not showing in Speedify and has a message under the Wireless Overview section that says “Wireless is not associated”. I can’t figure out what that means or how to correct it so that I can use another internet connection in Speedify.
